title: Problem with Network adapter
body:
My network adapter is 802.11bgn 1T1R Wireless Adapter. When I get into a ranked game it will disappear and reappear in my devices and printers. After doing that many times it eventually blue screens giving me BAD_POOL_HEADER, or PAGE_FAULT_IN_NONAGED_AREA (netr28ux.sys).  I tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it but it didn't work. I reseted my computer to it's original state but i get the same thing where it disappears and reappears however it hasn'tt blue screened yet.  Any help appreciated to fix the problem :). Thanks in advanced

Edit:  Also I have a Windows 8 as my OS

replies.body:
search device manager in your start menu

expand the network adapters tab

right click the adaptor and click update driver

have it search automatically to find signed drivers from windows update

if you have the driver on hand, and it doesn't find updates, uninstall the device (check the delete device drivers option), and click the monitor magnify glass icon at the top, and find the device to update automatically again. if it can't find one just install the driver you have on hand again.

Oh yikes, that's not good. I talked with one of our tech guys about what might be going on, and it would be a little hard to tell for sure without being able to see some of your League log files that are created when it's run. Since you've reformated already, those files are most likely gone as well. 

If this starts happening again, make sure to hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and send them the log folder created by using this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). With those, they'll be able to see exactly what was going wrong!
